g.text: Create a high-performance customer management API that reduces customer
service response time by 60% while supporting 10,000+ concurrent users.
Estimated 340% ROI over 18 months through improved efficiency
• Consider adding customer churn reduction metric (industry standard)
• Include mobile app integration timeline for better user experience
• Add compliance requirements for data privacy regulations
• Consider stakeholder training impact on timeline
Updated performance requirements - Response time target reduced to 200ms
Sarah Chen added compliance requirements for GDPR data handling
AI suggested architectural pattern: CQRS for read/write optimization
Risk identified: Database scalability concerns flagged by AI analysis
Complete context for financial services APIs with compliance
Customer management, inventory, and order processing
Avg. implementation time: 4.2 days (-30% vs custom)
Your business objectives are well-defined with quantifiable
How does this align with our architectural constraints?
Excellent question! Your performance targets require:
• Consider CQRS pattern for read/write separation
Generate the architectural decision record for CQRS
I've drafted the ADR including context, decision rationale,
consequences, and implementation strategy. Would you
like me to add it to your architectural layer?
Similar context found in CustomerPortal project (92%
Ask about context validation, patterns, or implementation...
